front.title: An equation of state for the thermodynamic properties of helium

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This report documents the equation of state for fluid helium implemented in Version 10 of NISTâ€™s REFPROP Standard Reference Database. The equation of state is expressed as the molar Helmholtz energy as a function of temperature and density, and is valid for the normal fluid (helium I) up to 1500 K and 2000 MPa. Limited comparisons with experimental data and with virial coefficients calculated by ab initio methods are provided.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
